articles.author: Tami Luhby
articles.title: Get ready for a summer of heat waves — and higher air conditioning bills - CNN
articles.description: Many Americans may get hot under the collar when they open their electric bills this summer, but for some, the consequences of rising utility costs can be a lot more serious.
articles.content:
Many Americans may get hot under the collar when they open their electric bills this summer, but for some, the consequences of rising utility costscan be a lot more serious.
